::Hot Rod::

    The ship lands. The DNA scanner searches for a beast mode. When 
it is done, the doors open. Emmerging from the ship, a Transformer 
wearing both the Maximal and Autobot symbols. He transformes to his 
new "bat" mode, and heads for the Maximal base, the ARK.

    Hot Rod is here!
